name: Terabey: The Room Builder
description: Initially planned to be a simple Christmas scene builder in 2016, this project became much larger than originally intended. While this project has ran its course over the span of a few years, it stands among the few projects we are proud to show and are dear to our heart. While we are currently working on Terabey: The Home Builder, please take a look at the original project that inspired us to continue its legacy.
